concept.title: Select items to delete from cache dialog box
concept.shortdesc: The Select Items To Delete from Cache dialog box enables you to delete point cloud files that are stored in the cache.

section.title: Cache used
section.p: Specifies the total amount of used cache.

section.title: Available
section.p: Specifies the total amount of available cache. The available cache is controlled by the POINTCLOUDCACHESIZE system variable.

section.title: Dataset
section.p: Displays a list of cached point cloud files including their names and locations. You can select point cloud files from the list to delete them from the cache.

section.title: Size
section.p: Displays the amount of cache used for each point cloud file.

section.title: OK
section.p: Displays the Confirm deleting selected cache items dialog box where you can review the list of point clouds to be deleted.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Closes the dialog box without deleting point cloud files from the cache.
